>
[Major Lesson](/Feats.aspx?ID=1579) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your patron grants you even greater secrets. Choose a [major, greater, or basic lesson](/classes/witch/lessons). You gain its associated hex, and your familiar learns the associated spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time if you're 14th level or higher, and a third time if you're 18th level or higher. Choose a different lesson each time.
name: Major Lesson
